SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Brittany Bertonaschi’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that our students will realize the impact that they have had on our lives…”

– Mrs. Brittany Bertonaschi, Elementary Special Education Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/students-realize-impact-our-lives/
